text: Yuji Iwata (岩田裕二, Iwata Yūji, April 15, 1946; Otsu, Shiga Prefecture {age 75} - ) is a Japanese musician and drummer for the OX, a Japanese GS band. His nickname was Yuji (ユージ) and his real name is Yuiji Iwata (岩田裕次). == Career == After leaving "The Kings" with Toshio Fukui, he participated in the formation of "Ox". After the dissolution of Ox, Iwata formed "Harimao" and participated in the management. After that, he devoted himself to music producers and is still active to this day. title: Yuji Iwata
